com.embeddedunveiled.serial.vendor

Enum SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL>
      • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.vendor.SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL>
    Enclosing class:
    SerialComFTDID2XX

    public static enum SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL
extends java.lang.Enum<SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL>

    Pre-defined enum constants for flow control of a serial frame.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      FT_FLOW_DTR_DSR
      Flow control through DTR and DSR lines.
      FT_FLOW_NONE
      No flow control.
      FT_FLOW_RTS_CTS
      Flow control through RTS and CTS lines.
      FT_FLOW_XON_XOFF
      Flow control through software.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • FT_FLOW_NONE

        public static final SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL FT_FLOW_NONE

        No flow control. Application is responsible to manage data buffers.

      • FT_FLOW_RTS_CTS

        public static final SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL FT_FLOW_RTS_CTS

        Flow control through RTS and CTS lines.

      • FT_FLOW_DTR_DSR

        public static final SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL FT_FLOW_DTR_DSR

        Flow control through DTR and DSR lines.

      • FT_FLOW_XON_XOFF

        public static final SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL FT_FLOW_XON_XOFF

        Flow control through software.

        for (SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL c : SerialComFTDID2XX.FLOWCTRL.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
